replies.body: I've played League on a laptop. Without a mouse.
welcome to the salty spitoon

You: how tough are you
Me: I play soraka
You:so
Me:as adc

me:i played league on a laptop
you: so
me: on an hotel internet
i've played on an airplane b4 pretty sure the lady behind me was going to take my mouse from me. but yeah 500 steady ping wasn't the best ever.

Me: I walked in and stole first Dragon
You: Sooo?
Me: As {{champion:89}} , from a {{champion:107}} after I got first blood, then proceeded to take baron buff later on. 
https://i.gyazo.com/thumb/200/_593a9983b9dc21f5d9789c4ad841ddad.png
https://i.gyazo.com/thumb/200/_86082031cdb6417befadd9b17d77ae37.png
https://i.gyazo.com/thumb/200/_440961678a0e8677a15d2a21658b2c1d.png
well i suggest you watch the adventures of full ad soraka from uberdanger then
I remove my flash drive without hitting the eject button.
I don't always use RAID... But when I do, it's completely unnecessary.
I play on my desktop....without a mouse. I clearly won.
My friend plays on his laptop tracpad....and shockingly is an absolute god
My friend plays with about 1000 ping most of the time and is incredibly good too.
Okay 1000 ping is literally playing a second behind the rest of the game.  I dont see how that's even possible lol

I've had 1000 ping for about a minute in a game before, it was not possible, it feels like an eternity between your actions and the game responding, last hitting is just about impossible, and forget about skill shots completely. I don't know how you could even adjust to such delay and play decently, let alone "incredibly good" as that guy says.
Well I've played League on the East Coast, beat that!
**_SOMONE_**                fetch this man a cookie

"Have a story about a time when you triumphed over League against immeasurable odds?"

Yeah. Every game with my friends :^)
Someone played lee sin with their eyes covered
Had an afk volibear at a turret, enemy team was chasing me and they towerdived, voli just afk' auto them and he got a triple.
afk farming ;)
AFK=A Free Kill....for me that is {{champion:106}}

I played on my internet for two years...

When i went to my friend's house I couldn't CS cus i wasn't lagging enough.

'nuff said
Why don't the trees in Canada have free Wi-Fi :(
I really don't know , it would make sense tho.
I guess giving us the air we breathe is a bit much to ask for.

nerd mode activated... actually the phytoplankton floating around near the surface of the ocean is what gives 90% of the oxygen we breathe, and trees giving us most the oxygen is just a treehugger's propaganda :p

Minor quibble: Us "treehuggers" mostly care about them because they provide a habitat for many animals. Also, they prevent erosion and are a valuable resource that can be renewed if proper action is taken.

ok SAVE THE OCEANS!! then...?  actually it seems like they might be in more danger than the trees these days. and trees also help purify streams and clean up the water and purify the air, keep dust down, snow off the roads ect.
Dang. You beat me to this comment. Wow. I am a serious nerd.
i don't get the joke...and im canadian
So am i , and i don't get the joke either
Do you get wifi, though?

the joke is that if trees gave (free) wifi everyone would want them everywhere, but they actually give us air that we breathe to survive. that basically means that we rather have wifi that connects you to the internet instead of living. get it now?

I had to go AFK under turret. I came back to see that I had 7 kills, when I had 3 before leaving. My teammates refused to tell me what happened, as did the other team. To this day, I have no clue what happened.
wait.. were you playing {{champion:106}} ?
one time I had to play league while explaining why I couldn't stop or pause the game to my parents, probably the hardest game of my life.

Just played a game with my 7 year old nephew hanging on my shoulder asking me to explain every single thing going on, including why there were butterflys and frogs in the jungle, and what i could do with them. Went 26-11-15 as Ashe, but lost because I couldn't focus and carry my team the way I needed to with the kid in my ear the entire game, losing baron at the end...I apologized to my teammates profusely, I still feel like a dick 2 hours later.

That was extreme.
I survived a game without quickcast. Rest in peace, skillshots
I started playing league without smartcast. I was level 30 before I learned to play on smartcast lol
ikr
I won a 2v5 once. Hardest game I ever played.
I was one of the 2, in case you were wondering.
Oh no... now my teammates are going to try this in my promo games.. :'(
I played {{champion:30}} without the r key
I've played League while my mom is calling me for dinner
I play League of Legends ... with an emulated xbox controller
He better not be playing ranked.
Ranked ARAM?
When I somehow got a Double Kill in the middle of a packet loss..
